text: I humbly accept my party's nomination to
be vice president of the United States
Tim Kaine needed to do two things in his
speech he needed to give some
biographical information which he did
and he needed to attack Donald Trump he
never tells you how he's going to do any
of the things he says he'll do the first
part of the speech when he did his bio
was maybe not quite as effective as it
could have been partly because it didn't
play so well in the big auditorium can I
be honest with you about something I
never expected to be here but when he
got to the part about attacking Donald
Trump he got more energized in
particular the audience loved when he
mocked Donald Trump's use of the phrase
believe me believe me repeatedly
impersonating him in a kind of funny
voice and suggesting to the audience
repeatedly that they shouldn't believe
the things that Donald Trump says
there's nothing suspicious in my tax
returns believe made
